creator: seade@apache.org
text:
When you go File | New, JMeter (cvs head) appears to retain the name of the last
test plan that was saved.  I just lost a good bunch of changes to my script
(have to revert to my last backup) because I accidentally went File | Save
rather than File | Save as... after doing a File | New to test a JMeter frature.

Patch will be attached shortly.

Created attachment 4220
Clears the old filename when File New is processed.
creator: seade@apache.org
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
